text: Abramovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Gankovskoye Rural Settlement of Tikhvinsky District, Leningrad Oblast, Russia. The population was 6 as of 2017. == Geography == The village is located 15 km from Gankovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Leningrad Oblast Category:Novgorod Governorate
title: Abramovo, Leningrad Oblast
